info.name: Scour+
info.description: This script makes Scour have a fixed center width, removes the ads, and adds a few other changes to make it nicer to use.
info.additionalInfo:
Update Oct 17, 2009: Small fix to make the width of the search bar longer.

Update Oct 4, 2009: Small update to work with the new 

Update Sept 29, 2009: Made search bar bigger and confined the search stats to one line.

Update July 13, 2009: Recolored some stuff to make it fit the overall site colors better.

Update May 20, 2009: Small bug fixes.
Update May 13, 2009: Removed the feedback button.
Update May 3, 2009: Added mouseover colors to the page buttons and added tags for stylish 1.0.
Update Mar 15, 2009: Removed some unneeded white space and made the search area bordered. New screenshot again.
Update Feb 26, 2009: Added link hover colors, made the menu with "Sort By" look much nicer, and cleaned up the code structure. Also updated the "After" screenshot.
Update Feb 12, 2009: Removed Scour tips in the results area.
Update Feb 10, 2009: Overall width is smaller, results fill whole area.
